item.title: Rolling Up the Town: Story of a Small Mobile Grocery Store
item.description: One of my pastimes is watching documentaries about culture and humanities. Among various channels, NHK’s documentaries never let me down. And the good thing is, some programs can be streamed within a certain period on NHK World. Recently, I have been obsessed with a program called “Hometown Stories” — stories about

item.title: 优秀的产品与良好的心智模型
item.description: 唐·诺曼（Donald A. Norman）是美国认知科学、人因过程等设计领域的著名学者， 也是著名的尼尔森诺曼集团（Nielsen Norman Group）的
